data.title: No Liechtenstein
data.meta_description: Yes, that was the whole point to Liechtenstein in the first place; it gave them a seat in the Diet.  That was their chief aspiration, not the acquisition of...
data.text:
Yes, that was the whole point to Liechtenstein in the first place; it gave them a seat in the Diet. That was their chief aspiration, not the acquisition of land for its own sake.

need to know where i come from

im an american mutt. i've traced my family name back to Gundaker von Liechtenstein. please any info. on family history would be a great help.i need to know who i am, thank you.

In a purely legal basis couldnt the Principate of Liechtenstein considered as the successor state of HRE since it is the last surviving remnant of it??

In a purely legal basis couldnt the Principate of Liechtenstein considered as the successor state of HRE since it is the last surviving remnant of it??

Oh yes. It often is.

Why? Because it's still a monarchy? Then you might count Luxembourg too.

Why? Because it's still a monarchy?

The other former member states of the HREGN didn't exist anymore.

Then you might count Luxembourg too.

The Grand Duchy of Luxembourg was created after the end of the HREGN.

STOP thread-necromancy now!!!

There is definetly no need to dig this thread out, I considered it long forgotten, and I started it on my second day on AH.com.

PLease let it rest in peace.
